name: skullhouse.mit.edu
description: Website(public + internal) for MIT's Alpha Mu chapter of Phi Kappa Sigma(Skullhouse)
author: Yohan Guyomard <yohang@mit.edu>

scripts.build: yarn && node build.js && find ./www/api -type f -iname "*.cgi" -exec chmod +x {} \;
scripts.deploy2: yarn build && read -p "Athena Username: " username && scp -r ./www $username@athena.dialup.mit.edu:/afs/athena.mit.edu/org/p/phikaps-web/website && ssh $username@athena.dialup.mit.edu "cd /afs/athena.mit.edu/org/p/phikaps-web/website && find ./www/api -type f -iname "*.cgi" -exec chmod +x {} \;"
scripts.deploy: yarn build && read -p "Athena Username: " username && scp -r ./www/* $username@athena.dialup.mit.edu:/afs/athena.mit.edu/org/p/phikaps-web/website
